name: designsetgo/product-showcase-hero
title: Product Showcase Hero
description: Full-width hero section showcasing a WooCommerce product with large image, price, rating, and add-to-cart action. Requires WooCommerce.

attributeDescriptions.productSource: Whether to use a manually selected product or the current product from page context (manual or current)
attributeDescriptions.layout: Which side the product image appears on (media-left or media-right)
attributeDescriptions.imageSize: WordPress image size to use for the product image (medium, large, full)
attributeDescriptions.showPrice: Whether to display the product price
attributeDescriptions.showRating: Whether to display the product star rating
attributeDescriptions.showStockStatus: Whether to display the product stock status
attributeDescriptions.showSaleBadge: Whether to display a sale badge when the product is on sale
attributeDescriptions.showShortDescription: Whether to display the product short description
attributeDescriptions.showAddToCart: Whether to display the add-to-cart button
attributeDescriptions.showVariations: Whether to show variation selectors for variable products
attributeDescriptions.minHeight: Minimum height of the block (CSS value)
attributeDescriptions.mediaFocalPoint: Focal point for the product image (x, y coordinates from 0 to 1)
attributeDescriptions.contentVerticalAlignment: Vertical alignment of content within the content side (top, center, bottom)
